## Source: ossf-package-analysis (490467d98a5f3dcce3605ce769912fad8036917a2da1ab4065e039e6a970a34b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'health-and-wellness-collab-macro-deploy' @ 1.0.8 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
